DataElement.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Speech 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of their ability to speak in the past seven days, using a 4 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Speech
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients._A question about a person's most important health issues._The most recent week, including today._The exchange of spoken words.

ObjectClass.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Concepts.longName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Property.preferredName: Most Important Issue Past Week Speech
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about a person's most important health issues.:The most recent week, including today.:The exchange of spoken words.

Concepts.definition: A question about a person's most important health issues.
The most recent week. May include the present day.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: UWQoLv4:University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Rogers S.N., and Lowe D., Version 4, 1999
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG study in Rave per request by V.Patel. mc 5/16/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard of four responses from speech the same as always to cannot be understood.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual cannot be understood.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual cannot be understood.

PermissibleValues.value: Only my family and friends can understand me.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Only Family and Friends Can Understand Me

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Only Family and Friends Can Understand Me
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual can only be understood by friends and family.

Concepts.longName: Only Family and Friends Can Understand Me
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual can only be understood by friends and family.

PermissibleValues.value: I have difficulty saying some words but I can be understood over the phone.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Have Difficulty Saying Some Words But Can Be Understood Over the Phone

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Have Difficulty Saying Some Words But Can Be Understood Over the Phone
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has difficulty saying some words, but can be understood over the phone.

Concepts.longName: Have Difficulty Saying Some Words But Can Be Understood Over the Phone
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has difficulty saying some words, but can be understood over the phone.

PermissibleValues.value: My speech is the same as always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's speech has not changed.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's speech has not changed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
